sentences.en: Again, we turn to the past f firmness, but no belligerence, and by no belligerence.
sentences.cn: 让我们再一次重温过去, 那就是强硬而不好战.

sentences.en: All children were afraid of the dark and the only cure was firmness.
sentences.cn: 所有的孩子都是害怕黑暗的,惟一的办法就是决不迁就.

sentences.en: He expressed his thoughts with customary firmness and logic.
sentences.cn: 他以一贯的坚定性和逻辑性谈了他的看法.

sentences.en: He was a man of intelligence and of firmness of will.
sentences.cn: 他是个聪明而又意志坚定的人.

sentences.en: His firmness on his belief supported him in difficulties.
sentences.cn: 困境中,他坚定的信仰支撑着他.

sentences.en: I spread my arms before Romilagu, trying to communicate firmness to him.
sentences.cn: 我在罗米拉尤面前摊开双臂, 示意他坚强些.

sentences.en: Love asks faith, and faith firmness.
sentences.cn: 爱情要求信任, 信任要求坚定.

sentences.en: Masculine: Describes wines with more masculine qualities: firmness, power and strength.
sentences.cn: 阳刚的: 形容葡萄酒具有更阳刚的性质: 坚定 、 强劲有力.

sentences.en: The mineral micro combination can improve the skin vitality and skin firmness.
sentences.cn: 海洋糖原与微量矿物组合,可改善皮肤活力,紧致肌肤.

sentences.en: This time, despite an attempt at firmness, there was a tremor in her voice.
sentences.cn: 这时, 尽管她想坚强一些, 可是声音还是有些颤抖.

sentences.en: Vegetables should retain some firmness and should not be soggy and waterlogged.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜应保持一定的硬挺度，不应潮乎乎的浸透了水。

sentences.en: What'simpressed me has been his considerable firmness of purpose.
sentences.cn: 令我印象深刻的是他对目标的坚定不移。

sentences.en: You must carry out all orders with firmness and purge all rightist views!
sentences.cn: 坚决执行命令,肃清一切右倾的观点!

sentences.en: Your recalcitrance obliges firmness on me.
sentences.cn: 你们不听话,那我就得采用果断措施.

sentences.en: Your recalcitrance obliges firmness on my part.
sentences.cn: 你不服从,迫使我这方面更坚定了.

words.tran_cn: 坚定的；牢固的；严格的；结实的
